description:
Number of creditors

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
63511 Statistics on overindebtedness

Definition:
The creditor is a person (or firm, municipality, Land) that
has a claim (e.g. for performance due to purchase,
repayment, etc.) against the debtor. The creditor is
entitled to claim performance (Section 241 of the German
Civil Code).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Number of creditors
